scripts.git:consolidar:
bun -e "const fs=require('node:fs');const cp=require('node:child_process');const file='package.json';const original=fs.readFileSync(file,'utf8');let pkg;try{pkg=JSON.parse(original);}catch(e){process.stderr.write('No se pudo parsear package.json
');process.exit(2);}const oldVersion=String(pkg&&pkg.version||'');const now=new Date();const y=now.getFullYear();const m=String(now.getMonth()+1).padStart(2,'0');const d=String(now.getDate()).padStart(2,'0');const todayPrefix=String(y)+'.'+m+'.'+d;function bumpWithDate(v){const match=/^(\d{4})\.(\d{2})\.(\d{2})(?:\.(\d+))?$/.exec(String(v).trim());if(match&&String(match[1])+'.'+match[2]+'.'+match[3]===todayPrefix){const n=match[4]?Number(match[4]):0;if(!Number.isFinite(n)||n<0){throw new Error('La versión actual tiene un sufijo inválido');}return todayPrefix+'.'+String(n+1);}return todayPrefix+'.1';}let nextVersion;try{nextVersion=bumpWithDate(oldVersion);}catch(e){process.stderr.write(String(e&&e.message||e)+'
');process.exit(2);}pkg.version=nextVersion;const updated=JSON.stringify(pkg,null,4)+'
';try{fs.writeFileSync(file,updated,'utf8');cp.execFileSync('git',['add',file],{stdio:'inherit'});cp.execFileSync('git',['commit','-m',nextVersion],{stdio:'inherit'});}catch(e){try{fs.writeFileSync(file,original,'utf8');}catch{}try{cp.execFileSync('git',['reset','--',file],{stdio:'inherit'});}catch{}process.stderr.write(String(e&&e.message||e)+'
');process.exit(1);}"
